flawed_nl_solution:
The have run 12 laps because 6 + 6 = <<6+6=12>>12
They have run 1800 meters because 12 x 150 = <<12*150=1800>>1800
They have 6000 more meters to run because 2400 - 1800 = <<2400-1800=6000>>6000
The have to run 40 more laps because 6000 / 150 = <<6000/150=40>>40
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 6000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
